input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
A Chaya Plant in a Six Inch Pot

Product specifications:
A single new Emeritus Gardens Chaya rooted cutting shipped in a Six inch pot.
Emeritus Gardens Plant Food is included so that Chaya roots develop quickly and plants can be planted out quickly.
Ideal vegetable .for highly nutritious soups and stews. Emeritus Gardens Care sheet is included.
Vitamin and iron content exceeds that of Spinach plants.
Grow in warm sunny southern gardens or indoors in the North.
Shippped BARE ROOTED to California.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Hey there, little grower! 🌱👋 Do you want a super cool plant that's yummy and good for you? 🥑🥗 Introducing our AWESOME Chaya Plant in a Six Inch Pot! 😍

This plant is like a magic veggie that grows fast and strong, and it's PACKED with vitamins and iron! 💪🏼🥑 Just like Spinach, but even better! 😲

It's perfect for making yummy soups and stews, and it's so easy to grow! 🍲🥘 Just plant it in the sun (or indoors if you live in the North), give it some food, and watch it grow! 🌻💧

We'll even send you some special plant food so your Chaya Plant can grow strong and healthy, and we'll give you a special care sheet to help you take care of it! 🌱💕

So, what do you say? Do you want to grow your very own Chaya Plant? 🤔👀 Just click the "add to cart" button and get ready for some fun and healthy eating! 😄👍
input_text.Response B:
Chaya plants are a great addition to any garden, providing a unique variety of vitamins and minerals. The Emeritus Gardens Chaya plant is an excellent source of nutrients and can be used in a variety of ways, including soups and stews. With the included Emeritus Gardens Plant Food, you can ensure that your Chaya plant grows quickly and strong, allowing you to enjoy it in your dishes. The Chaya plant is also known for its high vitamin and iron content, making it a great addition to a healthy diet. With the included care sheet, you can ensure that your Chaya plant thrives and provides you with fresh produce for years to come.

Respond with interest:
The Chaya plant has a unique and interesting history, making it a great conversation piece for any garden enthusiast. With its high nutritional content, it provides a great source of vitamins and minerals for your diet. The included Emeritus Gardens Plant Food makes it easy to plant and grow the Chaya plant in your garden or indoors. With the included care sheet, you can ensure that your Chaya plant thrives and provides you with fresh produce for years to come. This product is a great addition to any garden, offering a unique variety and a healthy source of nutrients.

Respond with desire:
The Chaya plant is a unique and versatile addition to any garden, providing a variety of vitamins and minerals. With the included Emeritus Gardens Plant Food, you can ensure that your Chaya plant grows quickly and strong, allowing you to enjoy it in your dishes. The Chaya plant is also known for its high vitamin and iron content, making it a great addition to a healthy diet. With the included care sheet, you can ensure that your Chaya plant thrives and provides you with fresh produce for years to come. The Emeritus Gardens Chaya plant in a six inch pot is a great investment for any garden or home.

Respond with action:

With the included Emeritus Gardens Plant Food and care sheet, you can ensure that your Chaya plant thrives and provides you with fresh produce for years to come. input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
